heading: HB00019
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT AND CONSTRUCTION OF A SECOND RUNWAY AT THE MACTAN-CEBU INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (MCIA) WITH ITS CONCOMITANT ACCESS TAXIWAYS AND RAPID EXIT TAXIWAYS (RET), RUNWAY LIGHTING SYSTEMS, AND NAVIGATIONAL/LANDING EQUIPMENT, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-07-23
